name: @benc-uk/gsots3d
description: Getting S**t On The Screen in 3D. A library for doing 3D graphics in the browser.
author: Ben Coleman

scripts.lint: eslint --ext .ts src && prettier --check src && prettier --check shaders
scripts.lint-fix: eslint --ext .ts src --fix && prettier --write src && prettier --write shaders
scripts.watch: tsc && npm run build && run-when-changed --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --watch '**/*.glsl' --exec 'npm run build'
scripts.build-bundle: tsc && tsup --config tsup.config-bundle.js && mv dist-bundle/index.js dist-bundle/gsots3d.js
scripts.watch-bundle: tsc && npm run build-bundle && run-when-changed --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --watch 'shaders/**/glsl.frag' --watch 'shaders/**/glsl.vert' --exec 'npm run build-bundle'
